childproc_childproc_count.description: Searchable. Number of childprocs made by the child process

childproc_cmdline.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Command line of the child process

childproc_cmdline_length.description: Searchable. Character count of the child process' command line  Requires Endpoint Standard

childproc_cmdline_raw.description: Searchable. Command lines related to child processes  Note: This field's value is untokenized

childproc_count.description: Searchable. Count of childproc events reported by the sensor since last initialization

childproc_crossproc_actor_count.description: Searchable. The number of cross-procedure actors made by the child process.

childproc_crossproc_target_count.description: Searchable. The number of cross-procedure targets made by the child process.

childproc_effective_reputation.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Effective reputation of the child process; applied by the sensor when the event occurs

childproc_effective_reputation_source.description: Source of the effective reputation for the child process

childproc_filemod_count.description: Searchable. Number of filemods made by the child process

childproc_guid.description: Searchable. Unique identifier for the child process; same as childproc_process_guid

childproc_hash.description: Searchable. Hash(es) of the child process(es)' binary (MD5 or SHA-256 for Enterprise EDR, SHA-256 for Endpoint Standard)

childproc_md5.description: Searchable. MD5 hash of the binary executed by the child process

childproc_modload_count.description: Searchable. The number of module loads made by the child process.

childproc_name.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Filesystem path of the child process' binary

childproc_netconn_count.description: Searchable. Number of netconns made by the child process

childproc_pid.description: Process identifier assigned by the operating system to the child process

childproc_process_guid.description: Searchable. Unique identifier for the child process; same as childproc_guid

childproc_product_name.description: Product name associated with the child executable (from the binary resource)

childproc_publisher.description: Publisher name on the certificate used to sign the Windows or macOS binary of child process(es)

childproc_publisher_state.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. State of the digital signature(s) of the child processes' binaries

childproc_regmod_count.description: Searchable. Number of registry modifications made by the child process.

childproc_reputation.description: Searchable. Value-Searchable. Reputation of the child process; applied by the Carbon Black Cloud when the event was processed

childproc_sha256.description: Searchable. SHA-256 hash of the binary executed by the child process in the event

childproc_suppressed.description: True if the Carbon Black Cloud suppressed one or more childproc process records; not present if false (suppressed if the child process shows no interesting activity after the process is created); only reported for Linux sensors

childproc_username.description: Searchable. The user context in which the child process was executed
